attributes.action: Introduce pets as support systems for the more vulnerable members of society
attributes.additional_details: Known as a nation of animal lovers, it is becoming apparent, pets are now too often seen more as a liability. My best friend became unintentionally homeless. Unable to take his pets to temporary accommodation, he died by suicide after 10 days, having been separated from the support system that enabled well-being. The introduction of service dogs have proven invaluable for those with specific health needs. Pets are known to provide Therapeutic benefits, giving the sense of purpose to carry on.
attributes.background: Change current housing requirements, enable provision of housing with pets, for those deemed as vulnerable or alone. Pets assist with treatment of health, depression, isolation and addiction. Introduce person-centered housing based on individual need, further reducing the impact on public services.
